Environmental configuration module.

py_common.sp_env.m_conf.generate_env_config_paths()[source]¶

Generate and write to file paths based on general config.

Returns:

Error number

Return type:

int

py_common.sp_env.m_conf.get_env_conf_all()[source]¶

Get general config and paths environemental config.

Returns:

dictionary consisting of general and paths environmetal configs

Return type:

dict

py_common.sp_env.m_conf.get_env_config_base()[source]¶

Get environmental configruration.

Returns:

dictionary with following project environmental parematers: project_name, env_log_dir, env_conf_dir, env_dcv_dir, log_level

Return type:

dict

py_common.sp_env.m_conf.get_env_config_paths()[source]¶

Get environmental paths configruration from generated environmental config paths.

Returns:

dictionary with following project environmental parematers:

repo_dir, repo_tls_dir, repo_bld_dir, repo_src_dir, repo_conf_dir, repo_docs_dir, conf_dir, dcv_dir

Return type:

dict
